tool_description: Monitors geological survey equipment inventory, status, and allocation for field operations.

check_type.description: Type of equipment check: availability, maintenance, calibration

error_messages: Equipment not found: One or more equipment IDs not in inventory system.
Invalid check type: Use one of [availability, maintenance, calibration].
Invalid date range: Survey start date must be before end date.
Equipment unavailable: Some equipment is already allocated or under maintenance.
usage: Provide equipment IDs, check type, and survey dates to verify equipment status and availability.
